name: Base Jam (Dazariath)
description:
The earth is in utter peril and only you, the greatest baseball player in human history, can save us in this time of doom. Hit the balls back into the air before they reach the ground to stop the aliens from invading earth!

Created by:

Yeori Van Pearcy

Darragh Nolan

Player Sprite Inspiration:

"Ken Griffey Jr." by "Pixel Hall Of Fame":https://dribbble.com/pixelhalloffame
